function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, high morbidity and mortality rates","Mitigation":"Strict lockdown measures, travel restrictions, vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits, vaccine development","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Virus transmission in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infection, spread of disease","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, regular disinfection, social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C lighting, smart building management systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management, facility owners"},{"Description":"Impact of home quarantine","Impact":"Isolation, mental health issues, economic strain","Mitigation":"Access to mental health support, financial assistance, social connection tools","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote work technologies, virtual socializing apps","People":"Quarantined individuals, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, employers, social support organizations"}]}
